name: Strange Toilet
description:
In the McCoyneach's neighborhood a murderer is on the prowl. They did not expect that this evening they would face something ugly...

[Minimum requirements]
Dual Core Processor
Graphics Card with 1GB Memory
Ram: 4 GB
Hard Drive Space: 1 GB
System: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 / Linux / Mac OS
